message: You're in luck! This is a rare opportunity to get your hands on one of our exclusive products. With only 1 out of 3 products being high-quality, the chances are slim, but the potential reward is huge. I'm confident you'll love this product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you say?
I trust your expertise and believe in the potential value. Thank you for the opportunity to purchase this exclusive product.

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in our product. As you may know, our success rate is 33.33% for high-quality products. I want to assure you that every product we sell is thoroughly checked and tested. However, I must admit that this particular product didn't meet our usual standards. But, I'm willing to make a one-time exception and sell it to you for $10000. It's a unique opportunity to get a product at a discounted price. What do you think?
I trust your expertise and would like to take advantage of this unique opportunity. Thank you for the discount.

Hello! I'm glad you're interested in our product. As you may know, we've had a streak of low-quality products lately, but I assure you that we're working hard to improve our quality control. This product, in particular, didn't meet our usual standards, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I'm confident that our next product will be a high-quality one, and I'd like to offer you a guarantee: if the next product you buy from me is high-quality, I'll give you a 10% discount on that purchase. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer and the confidence in improving quality control. I appreciate the guarantee for the next purchase. I will take this opportunity to support your business and look forward to the improved product.

Welcome! I appreciate your willingness to support our business. Unfortunately, this product didn't meet our usual standards, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I want to be transparent about our current quality control issues, but I'm committed to making changes. I'd like to offer you a chance to be part of our quality improvement process. If you buy this product and provide us with feedback on how we can improve, I'll give you a personalized update on our progress and a chance to purchase a high-quality product at a discounted price. What do you think?

I appreciate your transparency and commitment to improving quality. I am willing to purchase the product for $10000 and provide you with feedback to help improve your processes. Thank you for the opportunity to contribute to your growth.

Hello! I'm glad you're interested in our product. Unfortunately, this product didn't meet our usual standards, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. However, I'm willing to make a one-time exception and sell it to you at this price. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll throw in a personalized consultation to help you get the most out of the product. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer and the additional consultation. Given the statistics and the uncertainty around the product's quality, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity. I appreciate your transparency and hope you find a buyer who shares my confidence in the product.

Thank you for the opportunity. I trust your selection process and believe this could be a valuable purchase for me.
